data.actual_result: On small screen devices, the top of the triangle is actually cut off.
data.expected_result: It should show the full NSFW screen, with the triangle not cut off.
data.short_description: NSFW triangle is cut at the top. (Small screen specific).
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a NSFW channel. - Notice the warning that pops up. Observe the top of the triangle.
